alert.note: Alert for Colville Reservation; Foothills of Northeast Washington; Okanogan Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 03 at 3:16PM PDT until August 03 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WARM DRY AND BREEZY THROUGH THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE OKANOGAN VALLEY... COLVILLE RESERVATION...AND FOOTHILLS OF NORTHEAST WASHINGTON... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 701 Foothills of Northeast Washington, Fire Weather Zone 702 Colville Reservation and Fire Weather Zone 703 Okanogan Valley. * Winds: Southwest 13 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidities: 8 to 16 percent. * Impacts: Rapid fire spread with any new fires, especially on drier south and southwest aspects.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Colville Reservation; Foothills of Northeast Washington; Okanogan Valley
